item.description: It's going to be a beautiful night to listen to the band Blue Matter while cruising the Piscataqua River and Portsmouth Harbor.  Come join us on the best Party Ship in the New Hampshire Seacoast Region for a 2 hour cruise of the harbor! Featuring Blue Matter - a four member rock act with a mix of groove-based rock with pop hooks. Blue Matter's live show Rocks and guaranteed to have the dance floor packed. Delicious drink specials for all to enjoy on board. **You must be at least 21 years of age. Cost: $16 purchase on-line, limited dockside parking $5, cash bar on board. Purchase your ticket at http://www.islesofsho...
